text: James Vear "Jim" Hansen (August 14, 1932 - November 14, 2018) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the United States House of Representatives from Utah from 1981 to 2003. Hansen was born in Salt Lake City, Utah. Hansen died on November 14, 2018 in Farmington, Utah at the age of 86.Jim Hansen, who served longer in the U.S. House than any Utahn, dies at age 86 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:United States representatives from Utah Category:Politicians from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:20th- century American politicians Category:21st-century American politicians
title: James V. Hansen
